string.text: The death rate of blunt weapons.
Use excessive damage to determine survival rate. Excessive damage is the excessive part of the killing blow.
If excessive damage is within this value, one is guaranteed to survive.
If excessive damage is beyond this value, one is guaranteed to die unless saved by surgeon.
Apply survival bonus from the medicine level of party surgeon.
Apply survival bonus from one's character level.
Apply survival bonus from one's armor value.
Use Armor value instead of character level to determine survival chance when Survive By Excessive Damage is off, or in battle simulations.
The armor value threshold to give a medium survival chance.
If set to false, the damage value is fixed. If true, it will randomly fluctuate around the center points.
If set to false, the death of soldier is determined by hitpoints reach 0. If true, the vanilla instant-death-by-chance is used.
Whether to use equipments and skill levels of a soldier to determine his strength, and simulate the progression of battles. If set to false, the vanilla Power is used.
Multiply the combat speed between AIs.
Multiply global experience points gained for everyone.
Controls the penalty applied to the side with more members. A higher value makes the side with more members stronger.
Controls the penalty applied to the side with more members in sieges. A higher value makes the side with more members stronger.
Whether warhorse charges are stoppable by thrust attacks.
Whether other types of horse and camel charges are stoppable by thrust attacks.
The damage multiplier to horses from pierce attacks.
Charge damage multiplier when charging from the back.
Enable PowerThrust. The total magnitude = kE * (0.5 * weight * speed^2) + kP * (weight * speed) + kC.
The coefficient for energy when calculating magnitude.
The coefficient for momentum when calculating magnitude.
The constant coefficient when calculating magnitude.
Thrust Hit With Arm Damage Multiplier
Damage multiplier when it is the handguard part of the thrust weapon that hit enemy.
Non Tip Thrust Hit Damage Multiplier
Damage multiplier when it is the not the tip of the spear that hit enemy.
Change the missile speed of every bow and crossbow to match its damage.
Multiply the missile speed of arrows.
Change the damage type of all bows and arrows to cut.
Multiple the missile speed of bolts.
Change the damage type of all crossbows and bolts to cut.
Multiple the missile speed of thrown weapons.
Multiple the accuracy of thrown weapons.
Multiple the damage of thrown weapons.
The air friction coefficient of javelins. The higher the value, the shorter range they can fly.
Air Friction of Arrows and Bolts
The air friction coefficient of arrows and bolts. The higher the value, the shorter range they can fly.
The air friction coefficient of throwing knives. The higher the value, the shorter range they can fly.
The air friction coefficient of throwing axes. The higher the value, the shorter range they can fly.
Required pierce damage to interrupt attacks.
Required cut damage to interrupt attacks.
Required blunt damage to interrupt attacks.
AI Lord Party Size on Respawn
The number of soldiers AI lords respawn with.
Player Clan Party Size on Respawn
The number of soldiers player's clan members start with when creating party.
Multiplier to the chance of successful retreat.
Turn on the party retreating from battle message.
The distance between two bandit groups to be merged.
Max Non Looter Number For Merge
The maximum number of non-looter bandits in the same group to be allowed to merge more.
The maximum number of looters in the same group to be allowed to merge more.
The maximum total number of looter parties.
